banner.title: Cookies & Privacy
banner.description: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience and analyze traffic. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of all cookies.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Necessary for the website to function properly. These cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytical Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting anonymous data.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to track visitors across websites to display relevant and engaging advertisements.

description.title: 1. Service Description
description.content: Kaarplus is a web platform that enables individuals and companies to sell and buy vehicles in Estonia. The platform provides listing publication, search, and communication tools.

registration.title: 2. User Registration
items: Only persons 18 years and older can register
Provided information must be truthful and up-to-date
Each person is allowed to have one account
You are responsible for your account security

listings.title: 3. Listing Rules
items: A listing must describe the actual vehicle
Photos must be authentic and recently taken
Prices are displayed in euros (EUR), with or without VAT
All listings undergo manual verification before publication
Fraud, misleading info, and illegal activities are prohibited

payments.title: 4. Payments
payments.content: Payments are processed by Stripe. Kaarplus does not store card data. All transactions are in euros. Refunds are handled according to the terms of the specific service.

liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Kaarplus is an intermediary platform and is not a party to the purchase-sale agreement. We are not responsible for the vehicle's condition, the seller's honesty, or the transaction's outcome. We always recommend checking the vehicle before purchase.

termination.title: 6. Account Termination
termination.content: You can delete your account at any time under settings. We reserve the right to suspend or close accounts that violate the terms of service.

intro.title: General Privacy Policy
intro.content: Kaarplus is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect the data you provide when creating an account (name, email, phone) and using the platform (listings, messages).

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content: We use your data to provide the service, ensure security, and fulfill legal obligations.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access your data, correct errors, and request data deletion.

whatAreCookies.title: 1. What are cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that a website saves on your device. They help us provide a better user experience and analyze website usage.

necessary.title: 2. Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function. They cannot be disabled.

analytical.title: 3. Analytical Cookies
analytical.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with the website. These cookies collect anonymous data.

marketing.title: 4. Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to display relevant advertisements to you.

management.title: 5. Managing Cookies
management.content: You can change your cookie preferences at any time by clicking the "Cookie Preferences" link in the footer. You can also disable cookies in your browser, but this may affect the website's functionality.
